case.name: Most Humiliating Moment
case.description: Prompts other characters to tell of their most embarrassing/humiliating moments.

markers.marker: Referenced when playing with a princess. Acerola is a supposed descendant of royalty who is always seen wearing rags.
Guzma nearly reveals his connection to the Aether Foundation.
Guzma brings up how annoying rich people are.
Guzma calls Chazz's duel disk a toy
Guzma suggests that Chihiro surrenders due to how awkward he is already.
Guzma calls Chihiro out for muttering while Guzma was taking off his bracelets.
Guzma questions why th computer is getting cards.
Guzma calls Chihiro a kid.
Guzma asks why Chihiro's even playing if he's so awkward and calls him a nerd.
Guzma comments on Chihiro's return.
Guzma comments on Chihiro's gender reveal.
Guzma points out how Chihiro seems uncomfortable taking off even just the ribbon.
Guzma is impatient during Chihiro's final stripping phase.
Guzma asks why Chihiro dressed up like a girl.
It took us 8 generations to get a Dark type gym.
Mentioned when playing with Navi. Ditto is a Pokemon that can shapeshift into anything.
Guzma threatens to leak Elesa's presence at the game to the public.
Guzma threatens to rip off Elesa's clothes if she isn't quick to remove them.
Guzma's hatred of popular trainers is revealed.
Guzma threatens to make Elesa regreat coming to the game.
The male player character of Generation 7. Mentioned when the player is male and is stripping.
The background is the spooky forest.
Mentioned when playing with Ryuko. Gladion is the rebelious son of the Aether Foundation president.
Referenced when playing with a school uniform character. Ilima is a school student and a Normal-Type trial captain.
Referenced when playing with Pit. Kahili is a Flying-type trainer and golfer. Her hair also gives the appearance of wings.
One of Guzma's lines based on a Kevin Durant tweet. Only appears when playing with Haru.
Another one of Guzma's lines based on a Kevin Durant tweet. Only appears when playing with Haru.
Mentioned when playing with Rinkah. Kiawe is a Fire-type Trial captain who's always shirtless.
The game's got lots of kids in it.
Guzma bullies megumin because she's smol and childlike.
Just Google this one.....
Prompt Marker that ecourages other characters to share embarrassing/humiliating moments.
Mentioned or referenced when playing with a gloomy character. Nanu is an exteremly apathetic cop.
Bullying Natsuki because her tits are tiny.
Bullying Natsuki because her boobs aren't big.
Bullying Natsuki because her mammaries are miniture.
Bullying Natsuki because her stature is smol.
Bullying Natsuki because she looks like a child.
Referenced when playing with a scantily clad character. Olivia is a model and a Rock-type Island Kahuna.
Bullying Pit because his clothes are crappy.
Bullying Pit because what he wears is weird.
Bullying Pit because we can.
Bullying Pit because he acts like a kid.
Mentioned when playing with a stoic girl. Plumeria is a high-ranking member of Team Skull.
Mentioned when playing with Kizuna or Navi. The in-universe Pokemon Encylopedia.
Guzma invites Ryuji to join Team Skull, if he can impress him.
Referenced when playing with a musician. Ryuki is a Dragon-type trainer and rockstar.
Guzma responds angrily to Ryuko's comment about him dying his hair.
Referenced when playing with a nerdy character. Wicke is a thicc scientist lady from the Aether Foundation who has mostly pink highlights.
